channel.title: POrdinary Archive
channel.description: POrdy 1st LP – Unreleased archive. For non-commercial distribution only.
channel.itunes:author: POrdy
channel.itunes:summary: POrdy 1st LP – Unreleased archive. For non-commercial distribution only.

item.itunes:author: POrdy

item.title: 03. 애AE 10. 나↗EntropY=darkE (1st Edition Tape Only)
item.description:
POrdinary Archive 25 June 2024 ℗ 2024 POrdy
2nd Edition [Detailed Instruction] 1. Stand in front of Nam June Paik - Hommage a John Cage, 1959 Reel Tape. 2. Play the Joseph Beuys - I Like America and America Likes Me (Coyote), 1974. 3. Watch for 4 minutes and 33 seconds. This is the 2ND VERSION. The 1ST VERSION will not be publicly available.
item.itunes:author: POrdy
